tool_description: Scrapper para buscar as principais notícias do Brasil
name: Google News - Brasil
title: Google News - Brasil

api_list.name: News
api_list.description: Busca as principais notícias referentes ao Brasil
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-news-brasil.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-news-brasil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-news-brasil.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-news-brasil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
